bridge-type.label: Homematic Bridge
bridge-type.description: The Homematic bridge represents a Homematic gateway

parameter.name: gatewayAddress
parameter.label: Gateway Address
parameter.description: Network address of the Homematic gateway

parameter.name: gatewayType
parameter.label: Gateway Type
parameter.description: Hint for the binding to identify the gateway type

parameter.name: callbackHost
parameter.label: Callback Network Address
parameter.description: Callback network address of the openHAB server, default is auto-discovery

parameter.name: callbackPort
parameter.label: Callback Port
parameter.description: Callback port of the openHAB server. If no value is specified, callbackPort starts with 9125 and counts up for each additional bridge

parameter.name: xmlCallbackPort
parameter.label: XML-RPC Callback Port
parameter.description: Callback port of the openHAB XML-RPC server. If no value is specified, xmlCallbackPort starts with 9125 and counts up

parameter.name: binCallbackPort
parameter.label: BIN-RPC Callback Port
parameter.description: Callback port of the openHAB BIN-RPC server. If no value is specified, xmlCallbackPort starts with 9126 and counts up

parameter.name: aliveInterval
parameter.label: Alive Interval
parameter.description: The interval in seconds to check if the communication with the Homematic gateway is still alive. If no message receives from the Homematic gateway, the RPC server restarts

parameter.name: reconnectInterval
parameter.label: Reconnect Interval
parameter.description: The interval in seconds to force a reconnect to the Homematic gateway, disables Alive Interval! (0 = disabled)

parameter.name: timeout
parameter.label: Timeout
parameter.description: The timeout in seconds for connections to a Homematic gateway

parameter.name: socketMaxAlive
parameter.label: Socket maxAlive
parameter.description: The maximum lifetime of a pooled socket connection to the Homematic gateway in seconds (default = 900)

parameter.name: rfPort
parameter.label: RF port
parameter.description: The port number of the RF daemon

parameter.name: wiredPort
parameter.label: Wired port
parameter.description: The port number of the HS485 daemon

parameter.name: hmIpPort
parameter.label: HMIP port
parameter.description: The port number of the Homematic IP daemon

parameter.name: cuxdPort
parameter.label: CUxD port
parameter.description: The port number of the CUxD daemon

parameter.name: groupPort
parameter.label: Group port
parameter.description: The port number of the Group daemon
